version_description:
感谢您使用LINER！

此更新包括这些改进和一些小错误修复。
1.支持iPhone X屏幕大小。
2.你可以在应用程序中看到“Trending Highlights”。
3.可靠性和应用程序的速度提高。

谢谢您！
Happy Highlighting~
Jinu (CEO, LINER Inc.)

In this update, we're taking a big leap.

We've put everything we've learned while building LINER since the summer of 2015.

Literally built everything from scratch, trying to make the best app we can ever create.

We're confident that this app will be one of the best apps you'll ever use.

Check it out and spread out the words of our effort please :)

Lastly,
thank you for using LINER.

Chris (CEO, LINER Inc.)

本次更新是LINER团队所获得的最大的飞跃。
LINER团队汇集了我们从2015年夏季学到的所有东西。

实际上，为了实现我们可以创建的最佳应用程序。我们不得不从头开始搭建一切。
因此，我们有信心说，LINER会将是您使用过的最好的应用程序之一。

请您先使用下以及多帮我们向您周围的朋友介绍LINER。

最后，
感谢您使用LINER和对我们的支持。

Chris Kim (CEO, LINER Inc.)

We're updating LINER app every week to make the app more faster and useful for you.

This update includes
1. Friendly onboarding guide for new users.
2. Export to Evernote.
3. Reliability and app speed improvement.

Check it out and spread out the words of our effort please :)

See you next week.
Chris Kim (CEO, LINER Inc.)

We're updating LINER app every week to make the app more faster and useful for you.

This update includes
1. Brand new design that makes you focus on the highlights.
2. 'Explore Tab' that lets you find interesting articles you should read.
3. 'Top Highlight' which is essentially the key takeaway of the article.
4. Reliability and speed improvement

Check it out and spread out the words of our effort please :)
See you next week!

为了带给您更加实用且便捷的工具，我们将对LINER App进行更新。

此更新包含
1. 更快速、更可靠。

即刻更新并告诉朋友们这个好消息吧！
